chapters.summaryKo: 야곱의 형제 에서의 후손 에돔이 이스라엘의 환난 때 배신한 죄로 심판받을 것을 예언합니다.
chapters.summaryEn: Prophesies judgment on Edom, descendants of Esau, for betraying Israel in their time of distress.
chapters.messageEn: Pride that betrays brothers will certainly be judged.

keyEvents.eventEn: Pride of dwelling in rock clefts
Standing aloof in day of disaster
Day of the LORD is near
